meanings.sent1: I heard a loud noise while pooping in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: My dog's pooping in the backyard is a daily occurrence.
meanings.sent3: The sound of pooping echoed through the quiet house.
meanings.sent4: The pooping of the old pipes could be heard throughout the building.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh pooping filled the room.

meanings.definition: To excrete feces from the body.
meanings.sent1: The cat was pooping in the litter box when I walked in.
meanings.sent2: I hope the baby stops pooping during the car ride.
meanings.sent3: The bird seemed to be pooping on people on purpose.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing trash can was pooping out a foul odor.
meanings.sent5: The volcano was pooping out lava and ash.
